verses.verse: And when the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was past, <S%G1230><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother of James, <S%G2385><s%> and Salome, <S%G4539><s%> had bought <S%G59><s%> sweet spices, <S%G759><s%> that they might come <S%G2064><s%> and anoint <S%G218><s%> him.

And very <S%G3029><s%> early <S%G260><s%> <S%G4404><s%> in the morning the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to the sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> at the rising <S%G393><s%> of the sun. <S%G2246><s%>

And they said <S%G3004><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> shall roll <S%G617><s%> us away <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sepulcher? <S%G3419><s%>
And when they looked, <S%G308><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> that the stone <S%G3037><s%> was rolled <S%G617><s%> away: <S%G617><s%> for it was very <S%G4970><s%> great. <S%G3173><s%>

And entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> a young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side, <S%G1188><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in a long white <S%G3022><s%> garment; <S%G4749><s%> and they were affrighted. <S%G1568><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Be not affrighted: <S%G1568><s%> You seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was crucified: <S%G4717><s%> he is risen; <S%G1453><s%> he is not here: <S%G5602><s%> behold <S%G2396><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> him.

But go <S%G5217><s%> your way, tell <S%G2036><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> and Peter <S%G4074><s%> that he goes <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee: <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall you see <S%G3700><s%> him, as he said <S%G2036><s%> to you.

And they went <S%G1831><s%> out quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and fled <S%G5343><s%> from the sepulcher; <S%G3419><s%> for they trembled <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5156><s%> and were amazed: <S%G1611><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3762><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they any <S%G3762><s%> thing to any <S%G3762><s%> man; <S%G3762><s%> for they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus was risen <S%G450><s%> early <S%G260><s%> <S%G4404><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> he appeared <S%G5316><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> out of whom <S%G3739><s%> he had cast <S%G1544><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> devils. <S%G1140><s%>
And she went <S%G4198><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> them that had been <S%G1096><s%> with him, as they mourned <S%G3996><s%> and wept. <S%G2799><s%>
And they, when they had heard <S%G191><s%> that he was alive, <S%G2198><s%> and had been seen <S%G2300><s%> of her, believed <S%G569><s%> not.

After <S%G3326><s%> that he appeared <S%G5319><s%> in another <S%G2087><s%> form <S%G3444><s%> to two <S%G1417><s%> of them, as they walked, <S%G4043><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country. <S%G68><s%>
And they went <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> it to the residue: <S%G3062><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> they them.

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> he appeared <S%G5319><s%> to the eleven <S%G1733><s%> as they sat <S%G345><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat, and upbraided <S%G3679><s%> them with their unbelief <S%G570><s%> and hardness <S%G4641><s%> of heart, <S%G4641><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> not them which had seen <S%G2300><s%> him after he was risen. <S%G1453><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> creature. <S%G2937><s%>
He that believes <S%G4100><s%> and is baptized <S%G907><s%> shall be saved; <S%G4982><s%> but he that believes <S%G569><s%> not shall be damned. <S%G2632><s%>

And these <S%G5023><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> shall follow <S%G3877><s%> them that believe; <S%G4100><s%> In my name <S%G3686><s%> shall they cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils; <S%G1140><s%> they shall speak <S%G2980><s%> with new <S%G2537><s%> tongues; <S%G1100><s%>

They shall take <S%G142><s%> up serpents; <S%G3789><s%> and if <S%G2579><s%> they drink <S%G4095><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> deadly <S%G2286><s%> thing, it shall not hurt <S%G984><s%> them; they shall lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sick, <S%G732><s%> and they shall recover. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2573><s%>

So <S%G3303><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> to them, he was received <S%G353><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and preached <S%G2784><s%> every <S%G3837><s%> where, <S%G3837><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> working <S%G4903><s%> with them, and confirming <S%G950><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> with signs <S%G4592><s%> following. <S%G1872><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
